task.title: Editing XML processing instructions
task.shortdesc: If you have instructions you want to send to an application using an XML document, you can use a processing instruction.

context.p: To create a new processing instruction, right-click in the Design view, and click Add Child, Add Before or Add After, then click Add Processing Instruction.
To edit a processing instruction in the XML editor Design view, right-click your processing instruction, and click Edit Processing Instruction. You can change the values in the following fields:

ul.li: The Target field is used to identify the application the instructions belongs to.
The Data field contains the instructions.

taskbody.postreq: Click OK to save your settings.These instructions were written for the Resource perspective, but they will also work in many other perspectives.
